sections.MISSION:
Kronos troop conduct Squad and TM LFX at Range 307 or 201 from 29 January- 02 February 2023- IOT increase infantry Squad lethality.
SP
OP
BUNKER
TRP 1
TRP 3
SBF
TGT OG 2
PL YETI
TRP 2
Task org: OIC: TM: 1LT Guyot, Mitchell SQD: 1LT Palmer, Russel NCOIC: TM: SSG Ozeata. SQD: SSG Colvin Ammo handler: Alt ammo handler: Squads: 1x Machine Gun Attached. 14x Teams & 7 Squads
Time restrictions 24 hours: munitions smaller than 20MM
0800-2300 munitions 20MM and larger
Concurrent training: 60MM handheld mode
Issues & concerns
Dig Request
Saturday training due to time
TGT OG 1
TRENCH
TM & SQD LFX (29 JAN – 02 FEB) - K TRP
SQD LFX Scheme Of Maneuver
3
LOA
0m
100m
Scheme of Maneuver: ENY OP
SQD initiates movement South in fire team wedge
Phase Line Sloth
SQD destroys 6 dismounted TGTs in MB1 simulating ENY OP
Phase Line Yeti
SQD moves on azimuth and identifies a bunker
SL evaluates situation with engagement criteria and moves to destroy bunker
SL establishes SBF and sends flanking element to destroy bunker
Flanking element moves and establishes a base of fire signaling a shift fire from the SBF
Once the shift fire is confirmed flanking element will destroy bunker
When the bunker is destroyed the SBF will break down and initiate movement to LOA at which time the flanking element will clear through the bunker
LOA Dog
Once all elements move to LOA they will establish a hasty defense and consolidate and reorganize LOA Dog
